If you do not appeal to it, find it offensive or just want to troll/flame taniguchi... well I guess there's not much you can have your way about it with whatever fetish he takes to be interested in working on, either you can just read it, accept, or not read it or just wait for his next work....

Literally had to register to rebuke somma yous
Apparently alot don't like to acknowledge the long established fetish of man wins all in the end/girl evolves to a freer (pervier) level
As with igyou mono kara, or Orc, Female knight and friends, the orcs finally get to leave and walk around with girl's bodies and change their lifestyle a bit that would satisfy the orcs or rather the girls identities have reset in stone
Like maybe some would like to imagine whether they would improve the girls' lives or how it goes

In a similar sense here, it's like after reading the man becoming the girl for real and the girl's soul slipping away and adapting to the man's memories and body (IF she forgets her memories but not her personality), 
it/Taniguchi is going for that 'you can imagine' whether their lives would improve... maybe the girl affect the man (body) to work harder in his proper job, the man's personality strengthening the girl (body) somehow make for an interesting girlfriend?

Look on the bright side. The story makes no sense and could have easily been solved so see this as non canon like most bad endings.
Taniguchi-san obviously got inspired by Date. Please don’t be like him and make a second redemption part of this. And make an Aoi Kunieda one please.
Yeah... I've enjoyed a number of works on this sight with pretty dark bad endings but this is just.. there's something about this one that leaves like, a pit in my stomach. No fun at all.

For real, what happened with Taniguchi? I really can't get exited with this bad endings, this one was especially sad, I am sorry, I don't liked this one :*(

I still love Taniguchi's work, but please, make good stuff too, waiting for the next :D

I'll basically repeat what you all said: great artist, body swap is great, but this story is BAD END. I loathe these stories of identity theft/robbing someone of their life. I need a redeeming part 2
